channel.title: What's the best way to make a village ASAP?
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "What's the best way to make a village ASAP?"

item.title: Re: What's the best way to make a village ASAP?
item.content:encoded:
Being Season 3+ with Ascension helps.

Being Sannin also helps.

item.title: Re: What's the best way to make a village ASAP?
item.content:encoded:
I mean things like how to get the village going faster.

I can worry about the people when the time comes, I've already got 2 friends who want to join.

item.title: Re: What's the best way to make a village ASAP?
item.content:encoded: I don't recommend making a village unless you know you can get at least 5 people.

item.title: What's the best way to make a village ASAP?
item.content:encoded:
I want to make a village but I need to Loop first and then make it back to Jonin, however I'm currently trying to get the Theme "All Together Now" so I can potentially get the team "Crazy Love Triangle" faster.

Anyone have any tips?
